Notes: Periodically spawns collapsing debris that can damage Mario upon contact. The individual debris can be frozen by the Orange Luma. For each spawn, a random debris model gets loaded. These models are called CaveInPartsBig, CaveInPartsMiddle and CaveInPartsSmall.

Obj_arg1.Name: Debris Count
Obj_arg1.Description: The number of debris to be generated. Stops generation after the requested amount has appeared. If set to -1, it will keep spawning more debris.
